titles.title: A resolution designating February 16 of each year as "International Black Aviation Professionals Day".
A resolution designating February 16 of each year as "International Black Aviation Professionals Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates February 16 of each year as International Black Aviation Professionals Day. It also encourages the observation of the day through recognition and celebration of the contributions of Black aviation professionals.
